venue.name: The Park at the Charles River

item.description:
Please check the weather for that day . If the weather is bad on Sunday at 8 AM I will cancel it.

This trip begins at the Charles River Canoe and Kayak Co. kiosk just west of Boston. Please arrive before 10 AM if you need to rent the boats. This is a co join meetup with other groups. We will start paddling east towards the city of Boston, where we will pass such landmarks as MIT , Harvard and eventually stop in front of the Museum of Science where we will turn around and make our way back to the rental kiosk. Of course we will stop along the way for lunch, so bring one!

There is free parking but you have to arrive early to get it.

On-Site Rental Rates & Available Boat Types
Kayaks PER HOUR /PER DAY
Click Now to Learn More
Single Kayak (1 adult) $15 / $60
Click Now to Learn More

Click Now to Learn More
Composite/Thermoformed Double Kayak (2 adults) $20 /$80
Click Now to Learn More

Click Now to Learn More
Kid's Kayak (age 6-12) $7 /$28
Stand-Up Paddleboards
Click Now to Learn More
Stand-Up Paddleboard (1 adult) New for 2010! $15 /$60


I would suggest you get the quads for 4 people and have it for all day so each pays only $ 22.00

Call me if you need to

617 640 1883
item.name: Kayak - Canoe Paddle - The Charles River City Trip
